name: HellGunner
overview: Jump into HellGunner and get ready to shoot zombies, monsters, and more. Explore massive 2d maps, shoot down enemy combatants, and blast your way through 20 levels. Can you take down the tough boss at the end of each area? If playing alone isn’t awesome enough, you can also team up with a friend for double the mayhem. If you enjoy fast-action full of fun and intensity, then HellGunner is gonna be a thrill to play! FEATURES * 2D shooting gameplay * Challenging bosses * Single player or local co-op multiplayer * 20 levels * Fun pixel art style
